des: CCR 247 is the best international radio that inspirational, empowering, educational, and entertaining. It focuses on the spirit,body and soul of a human being as it becomes the soundtrack of their everyday lives. It plays RNB, POP, AfroPop, African Jazz, Gospel, classics and Kwaito
